channel.title: 路透财经
channel.description: 这是一个追踪路透财经news的种子

item.title: 英伟达飙升，SPDR S&P 500 ETF 资产突破 5000 亿美元纪录
item.description:
SPDR S&P 500 ETF tops record $500 bln in assets as Nvidia soars https://t.co/Q3sRZeFbr1 pic.twitter.com/pX4WPx2xQg

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 24, 2024

item.title: 观看：📈 Nvidia 的股票市值增加了 2,770 亿美元，公司股价飙升 16.4%，报收于 785.38 美元，创下收盘纪录新高，这也是华尔街历史上最大的单日涨幅，因为这家重量级芯片制造商的季报超出预期
item.description:
WATCH: 📈 Nvidia added $277 billion in stock market value as the company's stock soared 16.4% to close at $785.38, a record-high close — Wall Street's largest one-day gain in history after the heavyweight chipmaker's quarterly report beat expectations https://t.co/XRPsQmTAsD pic.twitter.com/lJnLO5AxZZ

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 24, 2024

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 24, 2024

item.title: 美国、欧元区和日本的通胀数据可能是下周的头条新闻。在阿布扎比举行的全球贸易峰会将备受关注。更多信息
item.description:
US, Eurozone and Japan inflation numbers are likely to headline the coming week. In Abu Dhabi, a summit on global trade will be keenly watched. Read more: https://t.co/ePSavOsZxK pic.twitter.com/tXPBEIvST9

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 24, 2024

item.title: 上周五，标准普尔 500 指数和道琼斯工业平均指数再创收盘纪录新高，华尔街三大基准指数均实现了周涨幅，这在一定程度上要归功于人工智能宠儿英伟达（Nvidia）的持续发展势头。
item.description:
The S&P 500 and Dow Jones Industrial Average eked out another closing record high on Friday, with all three Wall Street benchmarks scoring weekly gains, thanks in part to AI darling Nvidia's continued momentum https://t.co/xNmywKUKOI pic.twitter.com/5VQGOBaFyG

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 24, 2024

item.title: 观看：🛒 在南非，Pick n Pay 公司表示正计划进行一次供股，以筹集不到 2.1 亿美元的资金；刚果国有矿商 Gecamines 正计划对其铜和钴合资企业进行全面改革。更多本周非洲商业新闻
item.description:
WATCH: 🛒 In South Africa, Pick n Pay said it was planning a rights issue to raise under $210 million; Congo state miner Gecamines is planning to overhaul its copper and cobalt joint ventures. This and more in the top business stories from Africa this week https://t.co/cS7OApGuey pic.twitter.com/h7ixqhI28B

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 24, 2024

item.title: 来自 @Breakingviews：美国和欧洲的石油巨头在同一个全球市场上销售同样的产品。但它们却走上了不同的道路。陈雅文认为，分歧来自于对石油长期前景的分歧 #BVTV
item.description:
From @Breakingviews: US and European oil giants sell the same product in the same global market. But they are on diverging paths. Yawen Chen argues the difference comes from a disagreement over oil's long-term prospects https://t.co/6WzJGzVUO5 #BVTV pic.twitter.com/vOjUD4VzEa

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 24, 2024

item.title: Blackstone 首席执行官施瓦茨曼在 2023 年获得 8.967 亿美元的薪酬和红利

item.title: 观看：Reddit 在 3 月份万众瞩目的首次公开募股（IPO）之前，公布了 IPO 申请文件。该公司报告称，净亏损收窄至 9080 万美元，而 2023 年的收入增长了约 21%。
item.description:
WATCH: Reddit made public its IPO filing ahead of its much-anticipated stock market debut in March. It reported net losses narrowing to $90.8 million, while revenue grew by roughly 21% in 2023 https://t.co/a7wmB2dJ4i pic.twitter.com/2QNxAA77Yl

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 24, 2024

item.title: 观看：日本日经指数本周创下了超过 39,000 点的历史新高。日经股指用了 34 年时间才攀上上世纪 80 年代日本泡沫经济时代的最高点。本周金融和商业大事件综述
item.description:
WATCH: 📈 Over 39,000 was the record high hit by Japan's Nikkei stock index this week. It's taken 34 years to scale peaks last seen during Japan’s bubble era economy in the 1980s. This and more in a roundup of the big finance and business stories this week https://t.co/peD6zaStQD pic.twitter.com/LVTTZ6FRGj

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 23, 2024

item.title: 上周五，Nvidia 公司的市值首次突破 2 万亿美元，其芯片产品受到了市场的追捧，这也让这家硅谷公司成为人工智能热潮的先驱。更多信息
item.description:
Nvidia hit $2 trillion in market value for the first time on Friday, riding an insatiable demand for its chips that made the Silicon Valley firm the pioneer of the generative AI boom. Read more https://t.co/XE4l1wTKww pic.twitter.com/oitl6lz6T7

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 23, 2024

item.title: 观看：南非矿业巨头西班业公司（Sibanye Stillwater）警告说，其去年的年度利润骤降了 91%，此后该公司股价下跌了 4%。观看本周撒哈拉以南非洲地区的商业头条新闻
item.description:
WATCH: 📉 Shares in South African miner Sibanye Stillwater fell 4% after it warned its annual profit plunged by as much as 91% last year. Watch what's been making the business headlines in sub-saharan Africa this week https://t.co/lDvYka9bzl pic.twitter.com/tuozdeHwkq

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 23, 2024

item.title: 来自 @Breakingviews：美国和欧洲的石油巨头在同一个市场上运营，但采取了不同的战略。前者在进行巨额交易，后者则希望将更多现金返还给投资者。陈雅文认为，分歧在于石油的长期前景
item.description:
From @Breakingviews: US and European oil giants operate in the same market but follow different strategies. The former is doing mega-deals, the latter wants to return more cash to investors. Yawen Chen says the disagreement is over oil's long-term outlook https://t.co/6WzJGzVmYx pic.twitter.com/TsthfeqlTG

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 23, 2024

item.title: 观看：Reddit 在备受瞩目的 3 月份首次登陆股市之前公布了其首次公开募股（IPO）申请文件。对于已有二十年历史的 Reddit 来说，上市将是一次重大考验。
item.description:
WATCH: Reddit made public its IPO filing ahead of its much-anticipated stock market debut in March. The IPO will be a major test for two-decades-old Reddit, which lacks the commercial success of social media contemporaries like Facebook https://t.co/a7wmB2dbeK pic.twitter.com/WvAFTkLbn8

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 23, 2024
